articles.title: IndianOil to pump in Rs 2,200 crore investment for various projects in Tamil Nadu - Economic Times
articles.description: The projects include 'grass-roots terminal' at Asanur and Vallur, 'captive petroleum' project, oil and lubricant-LPG jetty at Kamarajar port among others, Indian OilCorporation Ltd executive director and Tamil Nadu State Head, V C Asokan told reporters here.
